full_summary:
## Multiple Victoria-Class Spares

### Opportunity Information

- **Reference Number**: PW-22-01005966
- **Solicitation Number**: W8482-230606/A
- **Publication Date**: September 2, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: October 12, 2022 @ 14:00

### Goods and Services Required

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals for the procurement of various spares for the Victoria-Class ships. The required items include hydraulic accumulators, non-metallic bushings, machinery bolts, blanking covers, shear bolts, and O-rings.

### Delivery Locations

The delivery locations are as follows:

- **CFB Esquimalt**: Items 1, 3, 5, 7, 9, 13, 15, 17, and 19
- **CFB Halifax**: Items 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 14, 16, 18, and 20

### Quantities and Unit of Issue

The quantities and unit of issue for each item are detailed in the attachment.

### Submission Requirements

- **Language**: Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).
- **Product Offerings**: Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model, and/or part number and NCAGE.
- **Procurement Process**: The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

- **Name**: Cassandra Leach
- **Email**: [cassandra.leach@forces.gc.ca](mailto:cassandra.leach@forces.gc.ca)
- **Phone**: 999-999-9999

### Attachments

The following documents are attached:

- [W8482-230606_6000577995_item_2_n275_iss_a_soqr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/02/81c89f7d16c0ce37547b4b889c56f2de/w8482-230606_6000577995_item_2_n275_iss_a_soqr.pdf)
- [W8482-230606_a-_annex_a.xlsx](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/02/59ced524107777
